txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: A collection of hardened carapaces from the insects surrounding the Elf-camp of Echad Candelleth. All items should be delivered to Bainthir at the ruins.
'Know that this will be used well. Thank you.'

'The Men who are here need lessons and I have need of items that will teach them such a lesson. If you can collect the filth, carapaces and goo from the insects in the area, it would be well recovered.'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Hardened Carapaces
Bainthir, an Elf at the ruins of Echad Candelleth, is awaiting a delivery of hardened carapaces.
Deliver the hardened carapaces to Bainthir at Echad Candelleth in the Trollshaws
You have accepted a task to collect hardened carapaces from the insects surrounding Echad Candelleth. You are to deliver the items to Bainthir at the camp or to a collection box.
Wanted: A collection of hardened carapaces from the insects surrounding the Elf-camp of Echad Candelleth.
